name: Stream Basketball
description:
Elevate your stream and engage viewers with Vossel's Stream Basketball. This physics-based game overlay offers customization, a leaderboard, and endless competitive entertainment all in a non-intrusive way, ensuring your Twitch audience stays captivated.

Keep It Simple yet Competitive & Fun

Type !shoot [angle 0-180] [power 0-99] into your favorite streamer's chat and score the ball into the hoop. (Eg. !shoot 64 89) The more points you have, the higher you are on the leaderboard. A fun and competitive way to incorporate monthly giveaways, special roles, and other prizes.


Note:

Feel free to contact me via email or on the Steam forums if you've got any feedback. Whether something's not quite working right or you've got some cool ideas for new features or tweaks, I'm all ears!
